Assuming discrimination thresholds between high - grade and low - grade tumours of 0. 8 for 18F - FDG uptake and 1. 8 for 123I - IMT uptake, the accuracy values of 18F - FDG PET and 123I - IMT SPET for differentiating between high - grade and low - grade tumours were 21 / 23 ( 91%) and 19 / 23 ( 83%), respectively.
